scripts.dev: npm run down && docker-compose -f docker/docker-compose-dev.yml up
scripts.stage: npm run down && docker-compose -f docker/docker-compose-stage.yml up
scripts.prod: npm run down && docker-compose -f docker/docker-compose-prod.yml up
scripts.down: docker-compose -f docker/docker-compose-dev.yml down && docker-compose -f docker/docker-compose-prod.yml down && docker-compose -f docker/docker-compose-stage.yml down
